definitions.definition: difficult to deal with or to understand; full of problems; not certain to be successful

examples.text: The situation is more problematic than we first thought.
Which are the most problematic countries in the world for journalists?

wordOrigin: early 17th cent.: via French from late Latin problematicus, from Greek problēmatikos, from problēma, from proballein ‘put forth’, from pro ‘before’ + ballein ‘to throw’.
